thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 06 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Microchip Technology Announces Q3 GAAP Loss Per Share $1.07 From Continuing Operations

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Microchip Technology Announces Q3 GAAP Loss Per Share $1.07 From Continuing Operations
text:
Feb 6 (Reuters) - Microchip Technology Inc:
* MICROCHIP TECHNOLOGY ANNOUNCES NET SALES AND RESULTS FOR THIRD QUARTER OF FISCAL YEAR 2018
* Q3 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.36 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS
* Q3 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $1.07 FROM CONTINUING OPERATIONS * Q3 SALES ROSE 19.2 PERCENT TO $994.2 MILLION * MICROCHIP TECHNOLOGY- QTRLY RESULTS IMPACTED BY ONE-TIME TAX EXPENSE OF $439.8 MILLION RELATED TO TAX ACT
* ‍CAPITAL EXPENDITURES FOR ALL OF FISCAL YEAR 2018 ARE EXPECTED TO BE BETWEEN $200 MILLION AND $210 MILLION​
* ‍HAD ONE-TIME TAX EXPENSE OF $439.8 MILLION PRIMARILY RELATED TO TAX CUTS AND JOBS ACT IN QUARTER​
* SEES Q4 FISCAL 2018 NET SALES OF ‍$964.4 MILLION TO $1,004.1 MILLION​
* SEES Q4 FISCAL 2018 GAAP EPS OF $0.72 TO $0.80 * SEES Q4 FISCAL 2018 NON-GAAP EPS OF $1.30 TO $1.39 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
